Hymn.Arabic: " 12- اما أنت يا رب كائن الى الابد و ذكرك الى أجيال الاجيال .
Hymn.English: 12 But You, O Lord, shall endure forever, And the remembrance of Your name to all generations.

Hymn.Arabic: و لا تنزعني في نصف ايامي
Hymn.English: 24 I said, O my God, Do not take me away in the midst of my days.
